composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: The refusal to incorporate user-centric feedback in AI design leads to system rigidity, preventing necessary security adaptations and resulting in exploitable security inconsistencies.

composition_details.causal_chain_description: AI systems that infringe rights (Threat A) inherently fail to meet user needs, resulting in Reduced Usability (Threat B). composition_details.causal_chain_description: Privacy violations (Threat A) create conflicts between user needs and stakeholder goals (Threat B). These unresolved conflicts result in compromised features that introduce vulnerabilities exploited by attackers (Threat C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Privacy violations spark requirements conflicts, leading to compromised system features that attackers subsequently exploit.

svo_representation.subject: unresolved conflicts between user requirements and stakeholder expectations
svo_representation.object: compromised system features, project delays, and user dissatisfaction

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Privacy violations (Threat A) lead to conflicts and compromised features (Threat B), which results in inconsistent security standards that are exploited by malicious actors (Threat C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Conflicts arising from privacy issues result in compromised features and inconsistent security standards, which malicious actors exploit.

svo_representation.subject: improper handling of personal and biometric data
unfriendly systems
svo_representation.object: low user engagement and reduced adoption rates

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Privacy violations (Threat A) cause users to distrust and disengage from the system (Threat B). Low adoption forces users to use insecure channels, leading to data breaches (Threat C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Privacy concerns drive low user engagement, leading to the use of insecure workarounds that facilitate data breaches.

svo_representation.subject: improper handling of personal and biometric data
unfriendly systems
svo_representation.object: low user engagement and reduced adoption rates

threat_C_details.original_threat: Information Leakage and Unauthorized Data Access

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Privacy violations (Threat A) lead to poor engagement (Threat B). The resulting lack of adoption of secure tools means data flows through unauthorized channels, causing information leakage (Threat C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Fear of privacy violations reduces adoption of secure tools, pushing data into unauthorized channels where information leakage occurs.

svo_representation.subject: improper handling of personal and biometric data
unfriendly systems
svo_representation.object: low user engagement and reduced adoption rates

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Privacy violations (Threat A) result in poor engagement (Threat B), leading to a fragmented IT environment with inconsistent security standards (Threat C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Privacy-induced low adoption leads to a fragmented toolset across the organization, creating inconsistent security standards that can be exploited.

threat_B_details.original_threat: User Frustration due to poor usability and lack of user involvement

svo_representation.subject: Poor usability and lack of user involvement

threat_C_details.original_threat: Decreased User Trust resulting from User Frustration

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Surveillance leads to Privacy Infringement, which causes poor usability and lack of user involvement, resulting in User Frustration, and subsequently leading to Decreased User Trust.
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Surveillance  Privacy Infringement  User Frustration  Decreased User Trust

threat_B_details.original_threat: Increased Error Rates caused by high-pressure surveillance conditions

threat_C_details.original_threat: Operational Failures resulting from Increased Error Rates

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Surveillance leads to Privacy Infringement and associated pressure, which causes Increased Error Rates, resulting in Operational Failures.
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Surveillance  Privacy Infringement  Increased Error Rates  Operational Failures

svo_representation.subject: insufficient mechanisms to hold providers and operators accountable
svo_representation.object: AI system abuses and non-compliance with regulations

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) allows the deployment of systems with Inadequate Feedback Mechanisms (B). These mechanisms cause user confusion and errors, which creates opportunities for Attackers to successfully breach data (C) due to human error.
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Regulatory negligence permits opaque system feedback, leading to user confusion that attackers exploit to execute data breaches.

svo_representation.subject: insufficient mechanisms to hold providers and operators accountable
svo_representation.object: AI system abuses and non-compliance with regulations

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) permits systems with Inadequate Feedback Mechanisms (B). The resulting user confusion increases susceptibility to deception, allowing Phishing attackers to successfully steal sensitive information (C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Unaccountable design practices result in user confusion, drastically increasing the success rate of phishing and spoofing attacks.

svo_representation.subject: insufficient mechanisms to hold providers and operators accountable
svo_representation.object: AI system abuses and non-compliance with regulations

threat_C_details.original_threat: Information Leakage and Unauthorized Data Access

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) enables Inadequate Feedback Mechanisms (B), causing user errors. These errors lead to unintentional Information Leakage and Unauthorized Data Access (C) by malicious actors.
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: The absence of accountability leads to poor feedback systems, causing user errors that result in accidental information leakage.

svo_representation.subject: ineffective design
svo_representation.object: increased error rates and safety incidents

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) allows Ineffective Design (B), which causes Increased Error Rates and safety incidents. These incidents disrupt operations, allowing Cyber Threats to Impact Critical Services (C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Unchecked ineffective design leads to safety incidents and operational errors that expose critical services to significant cyber impact.

svo_representation.subject: ineffective design
svo_representation.object: increased error rates and safety incidents

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) results in Ineffective Design (B). The consequent errors and safety incidents compromise system states, allowing unauthorized actors to Breach Data Integrity and Confidentiality (C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Accountability failures lead to error-prone designs that compromise data integrity and confidentiality.

svo_representation.subject: unresolved conflicts between user requirements and stakeholder expectations

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) allows Unresolved Conflicts between requirements (B). This results in compromised features, creating Inconsistent Security Standards that malicious actors exploit (C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Governance failures leave requirement conflicts unresolved, resulting in compromised features and inconsistent security standards that are easily exploited.

threat_B_details.original_threat: Lack of Iterative Design and Feedback Integration

svo_representation.subject: non-iterative design processes that ignore user feedback
svo_representation.object: rigid systems that do not adapt to evolving user needs

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) permits Non-iterative Design Processes (B). This results in rigid systems that do not adapt, leaving Known Vulnerabilities exposed for attackers to exploit (C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: The lack of accountability fosters non-iterative design, leaving systems unable to patch known vulnerabilities which attackers then exploit.

svo_representation.subject: insufficient mechanisms to hold providers and operators accountable

svo_representation.subject: rigid design processes
svo_representation.object: iterative improvements and user feedback incorporation

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) enables Design Rigidity (B). This hinders improvements and updates, preventing the remediation of vulnerabilities which attackers then exploit (C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Rigid design processes, unchecked by accountability, prevent necessary updates, allowing attackers to exploit persistent vulnerabilities.

svo_representation.subject: inadequate training and support
svo_representation.object: users from effectively utilizing system functionalities

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) leads to Inadequate Training and Support (B). Users failing to utilize functionalities effectively commit errors that result in Data Breaches (C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Insufficient training due to lack of oversight causes user misuse, creating security gaps that lead to data breaches.

svo_representation.subject: inadequate training and support
svo_representation.object: users from effectively utilizing system functionalities

threat_C_details.original_threat: Information Leakage and Unauthorized Data Access

composition_details.causal_chain_description: Lack of Accountability (A) results in Inadequate Training (B). Users unable to use the system securely inadvertently allow Malicious Actors to Access Sensitive Data (C).
composition_details.composed_threat_path_description: Poor training and support leave users unable to protect data, resulting in information leakage and unauthorized access.
